description: A bustling port town in the Arabasta Kingdom known for its great shops, irresistible perfumes, and vibrant market atmosphere. It serves as a major trading hub and entry point to the desert kingdom.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive in Nanohana
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive at Nanohana and begin exploring the port town.
keyEvents.significance: Entry point for the crew into the main Arabasta Arc storyline.

keyEvents.title: Ace and Luffy's Reunion in Nanohana
keyEvents.description: Ace and Luffy reunite in Nanohana, where Ace reveals he is Luffy's older brother.
keyEvents.significance: Major character relationship reveal that takes place in this location.

keyEvents.title: Ace vs Smoker Confrontation
keyEvents.description: Ace uses his Kagero technique to block Smoker's attack in the streets of Nanohana.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of Ace's combat abilities occurs in this location.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning port town in Arabasta Kingdom

description: A restaurant in Nanohana owned and operated by Yoshimoto. It becomes the site of the historic reunion between Luffy and Ace, as well as the confrontation between Ace and Smoker.

keyEvents.title: Ace Falls Asleep at Spice Bean
keyEvents.description: Ace falls asleep face-first in his food at the restaurant, alarming patrons who think he died.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Ace's narcolepsy character trait in this location.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Crashes into Spice Bean
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Rocket and crashes through the restaurant's wall, accidentally hitting Ace and Smoker.
keyEvents.significance: The chaotic event that brings together the three key characters.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Demands Food
keyEvents.description: Luffy demands food from restaurant owner Yoshimoto after crashing through the walls.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases Luffy's priorities and Yoshimoto's patience.

keyEvents.title: Ace Revealed as Luffy's Brother at Spice Bean
keyEvents.description: Inside and outside Spice Bean, Ace reveals he is Luffy's older brother to Smoker and the Straw Hat crew.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most significant character revelations in the series occurs at this location.
